directions: In a small bowl, combine chicken, onion and barbecue sauce.
Place a damp paper towel on a plate and top with 5 of the tortillas. Top with a second damp paper towel and cover tightly with plastic wrap. Microwave about 30 seconds or until soft and pliable.
Lay out one of the tortillas keeping the remainder covered. Place about 2 tablespoons of the chicken mixture and 2 tablespoons of cheese.
Roll tightly and seal with a toothpick. Repeat with remaining tortillas.
Spray each tortilla with cooking spray (or lightly brush with olive oil). Place seam side down on a parchment paper covered pan and bake 15-18 minutes or until crispy.
ingredients: 1/3 cup of your favorite barbecue sauce
10 corn tortillas (you can use flour if you prefer) 6" size
title: BBQ Chicken Taquitos
